frontmatter.description: Trust is hard thing to do for some people. When you worry you are not trusting God. God loves you and wants you to trust in him. Will you?
frontmatter.title: Trust God and Don't worry

frontmatter.description: The passage of Matthew 4 is one of the greatest inspirational messages. It's a clear example of how we can overcome any trial in life.
frontmatter.title: Why it's Good to be Content
